attributes.action: Enforce both British & EU sanctions against the leaders of Burma in order to gain democracy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is in a position to widen democracy by enforcing sanctions in order to bring down this illegal regime that is equally despicable as Sadam Husain.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Enforce both British & EU sanctions against the leaders of Burma in order to gain democracy."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
